member.name: T:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable
member.summary: Represents a collection of key/value pairs that are organized based on both hash code.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.Add(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an element with the specified key and value into the BidirHashtable.
member.param: The key of the element to add.
The value of the element to add.

example.code: var bidirHashtable = new BidirHashtable(); bidirHashtable.Add("key", "value");

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.Clear
member.summary: Removes all elements from the BidirHashtable.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.Contains(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the BidirHashtable contains a specific key.
member.param: The key to locate in the BidirHashtable.
member.returns: True if the BidirHashtable contains an element with the specified key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.ContainsValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the BidirHashtable contains a specific value.
member.param: The value to locate in the BidirHashtable.
member.returns: True if the BidirHashtable contains an element with the specified value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of key/value pairs contained in the BidirHashtable.
member.returns: The number of key/value pairs contained in the BidirHashtable.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.Get(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key whose value to get.
member.returns: The value associated with the specified key.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.GetKey(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the key associated with the specified value.
member.param: The value whose key to get.
member.returns: The key associated with the specified value.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.Set(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the value associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key whose value to set.
The value of the element to set.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.Remove(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the element with the specified key from the BidirHashtable.
member.param: The key of the element to remove.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.BidirHashtable.RemoveValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the element with the specified value from the BidirHashtable.
member.param: The value of the element to remove.

member.name: T:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable
member.summary: Represents a collection of 2-keys/value trios that are organized based on the hash code of the 2-keys.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.Add(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an element with the specified keys and value into the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.param: The first key of the element to add.
The second key of the element to add.
The value of the element to add.

example.code: var twoKeyHashtable = new TwoKeyHashtable(); twoKeyHashtable.Add("key", "key2", "value");

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.Clear
member.summary: Removes all elements from the TwoKeyHashtable.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.Contains(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the TwoKeyHashtable contains the two specific key element.
member.param: The first key to locate in the TwoKeyHashtable.
The second key to locate in the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.returns: True if contains the two specific key element, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.ContainsRow(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the TwoKeyHashtable contains the specific row.
member.param: The key to locate in the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.returns: True if contains the specific key element, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.Count(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the number of key/value pairs contained in a dimension of the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.param: The dimension key of the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.returns: The number of elements contained in the TwoKeyHashtable for a specific dimension.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.CountRow
member.summary: Gets the number of first key trios contained in the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.returns: The number of elements contained in the TwoKeyHashtable.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.Item(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with the specified keys.
member.param: The first key whose value to get or set.
The second key whose value to get or set.
member.returns: The value associated with the specified key.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.Keys
member.summary: Gets an ICollection containing the keys in the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.returns: An ICollection containing the keys in the TwoKeyHashtable.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.Remove(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the element with the two specified keys from the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.param: The first key of the element to remove.
The second key of the element to remove.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.RemoveRow(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the row with the specified key from the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.param: The key of the row to remove.

member.name: M:ADN.DataStructures.TwoKeyHashtable.RowKeys(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets an ICollection containing the keys of the specified row in the TwoKeyHashtable.
member.param: The key of the row to gets the ICollection.
member.returns: An ICollection containing the keys of the specified row in the TwoKeyHashtable.
